parse.title: Demons (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Demons are a Slayer assignment.

When killing abyssal beasts and abyssal lords as part of a demon slayer task, each kill will count as two and five respectively towards the task.

When killing greater demon berserkers or greater demon ash lords as part of a demon slayer task, each kill will count as eight towards the task.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Minigames
    • 2.3 Quest
  • 3 Slayer Codex
  • 4 Update history

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign demons:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
The Raptor45-90None
Laniakea101-150 85

Slayer Codex[edit | edit source]

The assignment is relevant to the following Slayer Codex entries: Lesser demon, Greater demon, Black demon, Abyssal demon, Gargoyle, Kal'gerion demon, Tormented demon, Ripper demon, Abyssal savage, Abyssal beast, Abyssal lord.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included see here for how to help out!
  • patch 10 August 2020 (Update):
    • Kal'Gerion demons slain inside the Shadow Reef now count towards 'Demon' cluster assignments.
  • patch 2 March 2020 (Update):
    • Imps in the God Wars Dungeon will now count towards demon Slayer tasks.
  • patch 20 January 2020 (Update):
    • "Demons" cluster slayer assignment now counts imps as demons.
  • patch 6 January 2020 (Update):
    • Gargoyles now count towards "demon" cluster tasks.
